src.environment.scenarios.types package

Submodules

src.environment.scenarios.types.cycle module

class src.environment.scenarios.types.cycle.CycleScenario(env_name: str, partially_observable: bool = True, config_runner: bool = False, all_config: bool = False)

Bases: src.environment.scenarios.scenario.Scenario

A simple DEBUG scenario that will cycle through all the nodes in a graph nav file choosing a new node per episode until it cycles.

Useful for knowing which node on the graph nav is what ID for manual planning.

generate_scenario(num_humans: Union[int, Tuple[int, int]] = 0, num_agents: Union[int, Tuple[int, int]] = 1)
